sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.MultiSSO_SAMLMetaDataHelper</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>MultiSSO_SAMLMetaDataHelper</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var MultiSSO_SAMLMetaDataHelper = Class.create();
MultiSSO_SAMLMetaDataHelper.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    loadSAMLMetaFromXML: function() {
        var meta_xml = this.getParameter("sysparm_meta_xml");
        var sys_id = this.getParameter("sysparm_sys_id");
        var result = this.newItem("result");
        if (SNC.GlideMultiSSO.isMultiSSOv2()) {
            var resultMap = SNC.GlideMultiSSO.loadSAMLMetaFromXML(meta_xml, sys_id);
            if (resultMap.get('sys_id') != null)
                result.setAttribute("sys_id", resultMap.get('sys_id'));
            if (resultMap.get('error_msg') != null)
                result.setAttribute("error_msg", resultMap.get('error_msg'));
        } else {
            var resultArray = new SSO_SAMLMetaUtil().loadSAMLMetaFromXML(meta_xml, sys_id);
            if (resultArray.sys_id != null)
                result.setAttribute("sys_id", resultArray.sys_id);
            result.setAttribute("error_msg", resultArray.error_msg);
        }
    },

    loadSAMLMetaFromURL: function() {
        var meta_url = this.getParameter("sysparm_meta_url");
        var sys_id = this.getParameter("sysparm_sys_id");
        var result = this.newItem("result");
        if (SNC.GlideMultiSSO.isMultiSSOv2()) {
            var resultMap = SNC.GlideMultiSSO.loadSAMLMetaFromURL(meta_url, sys_id);
            if (resultMap.get('sys_id') != null)
                result.setAttribute("sys_id", resultMap.get('sys_id'));
            if (resultMap.get('error_msg') != null)
                result.setAttribute("error_msg", resultMap.get('error_msg'));
        } else {
            var resultArray = new SSO_SAMLMetaUtil().loadSAMLMetaFromURL(meta_url, sys_id);
            if (resultArray.sys_id != null)
                result.setAttribute("sys_id", resultArray.sys_id);
            result.setAttribute("error_msg", resultArray.error_msg);
        }
    },
    type: 'MultiSSO_SAMLMetaDataHelper'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-03-05 07:12:38</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>3f7aea665313001001a3ddeeff7b12cd</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>MultiSSO_SAMLMetaDataHelper</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Integration - Multiple Provider Single Sign-On (do not activate...use 'Integration - Multiple Provid" source="com.snc.integration.sso.multi">4762a9692fe21110d8a4d5f62799b613</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_3f7aea665313001001a3ddeeff7b12cd</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-03-05 07:40:59</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>1967</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
